name: My first strategic game
description:
Hi, welcome to my first strategic game!!

You are the blue-purple, click on the squares with your colour  for see your power, resources and alliances. Click on other squares near your squares to see their power and then you can attack or trade with them.

ATTACK

By attacking them you will take their territory (square) but only if your power is bigger (there is always a chance to losing anyway), if you lose you lose resources.

TRADE

If you trade with a colour you will rise your relationship with that colour paying them resources. If you get to the top relationship level you can make an alliance with them. If you make war with a colour you reset your relationship with it to null.

ALLIANCE

If you make an alliance the colour will give you a bit of his power to you (showed in your page) during battles, but if you lose you also lose the alliance. If you fight a colour that you made an alliance with, you will lose the alliance.

Only you can do things for now.
